text: Watch Dogs 2 is an action-adventure game released in 2016. It was developed by Ubisoft Montreal and published by Ubisoft. It is a sequel to Watch Dogs released in 2014. The game was released for the Playstation 4, Xbox One and Windows in November 2016. It released on Amazon Luna and Google Stadia in late 2020. title: Watch Dogs 2
